categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Lem was a male Human soldier of the Sith Empire during the Galactic War. Around 3640 BBY he was stationed on Voss, where took an incursion into the Nightmare Lands, which left him completely mad and unable to communicate. However, Lem was still alive and conscious, which prompted Doctor Olkav to use him as a test subject for the vaccine he was developing.
Lem appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic during the mission "Tapping Corruption" on Voss.
